title: How NASA’s astronauts learned they’d been assigned to the moon mission
description: None of the astronauts selected for the first mission to the vicinity of the moon in five decades were on time for what is probably the biggest assignment of their astronaaut careers.

title: NASA names crew for first human moon mission since Apollo
description: The astronauts will fly around the moon in a mission that would precede the first human landing there since 1972.

title: Say hello to your new tutor: It’s ChatGPT
description: As schools around the country are banning AI tools, Khan Lab School invites one into the classroom.
